articles.title: Mets' Pete Alonso returns way ahead of wrist injury timeline after being hit by pitch - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: "No I'm playing. Full go," Alonso said on Sunday when asked if he would have any limitations.
articles.content:
New York Mets slugger Pete Alonso was back in the lineup Sunday after sustaining a bone bruise and sprain in his left wrist injuries that were expected to sideline him for three to four weeks.

articles.title: It's Nebraska vs Michigan as 4-star Jacob Smith asks vital questions on OV - Rivals.com - Nebraska
articles.description: Four-star 2024 DE/LB Jacob Smith recaps his OV and tells Inside Nebraska he is down to the Huskers and Wolverines.
articles.content: The recruitment of four-star 2024 defensive end/linebacker Jacob Smith has come down to a two-way battle, Smith tells Inside Nebraska:Michigan vs. Nebraska.

articles.author: Dan Kingerski
articles.title: Watch: Golden Knights Parade Highlights, William Karlsson Steals the Show - Vegas Hockey Now
articles.description: By the end of the Vegas Golden Knights’ four-hour celebration, which closed down the famed Vegas Strip in both directions, even coach Bruce Cassidy was dancing and drumming on the podium. By the end, many of the players had removed their championship t-shirts…
